author: ahadnagy
message:
Change docker image to preview for the MI355 CI (#40693)

* Change docker image to preview for the MI355 CI

* Use pushed image

files.patch:
@@ -21,7 +21,7 @@ jobs:
       job: run_models_gpu
       slack_report_channel: "#amd-hf-ci"
       runner_scale_set: amd-mi355-ci
-      docker: huggingface/transformers-pytorch-amd-gpu
+      docker: huggingface/testing-rocm7.0-preview
       ci_event: Scheduled CI (AMD) - mi355
       report_repo_id: optimum-amd/transformers_daily_ci
     secrets: inherit
@@ -33,7 +33,7 @@ jobs:
       job: run_pipelines_torch_gpu
       slack_report_channel: "#amd-hf-ci"
       runner_scale_set: amd-mi355-ci
-      docker: huggingface/transformers-pytorch-amd-gpu
+      docker: huggingface/testing-rocm7.0-preview
       ci_event: Scheduled CI (AMD) - mi355
       report_repo_id: optimum-amd/transformers_daily_ci
     secrets: inherit
@@ -45,7 +45,7 @@ jobs:
       job: run_examples_gpu
       slack_report_channel: "#amd-hf-ci"
       runner_scale_set: amd-mi355-ci
-      docker: huggingface/transformers-pytorch-amd-gpu
+      docker: huggingface/testing-rocm7.0-preview
       ci_event: Scheduled CI (AMD) - mi355
       report_repo_id: optimum-amd/transformers_daily_ci
     secrets: inherit
@@ -57,7 +57,7 @@ jobs:
       job: run_torch_cuda_extensions_gpu
       slack_report_channel: "#amd-hf-ci"
       runner_scale_set: amd-mi355-ci
-      docker: huggingface/transformers-pytorch-deepspeed-amd-gpu
+      docker: huggingface/testing-rocm7.0-preview
       ci_event: Scheduled CI (AMD) - mi355
       report_repo_id: optimum-amd/transformers_daily_ci
     secrets: inherit
